thread.text:
Meeting generates 200 PowerPoint slides. Everyone nods along.

Nothing surprising. Nothing decided. High bandwidth, zero signal.

Information Theory & Physical Reality.

Information capacity sets an upper limit, but actual content often falls far short of what's possible.

From The Idea Factory by John Gertner:

"Information capacity sets an upper bound, but actual content often falls short. Signal versus noise matters more than volume."

Slides don't equal information.

Couldn't keep track of what I was learning. Built this to fix that. Use what helps.

https://www.cosmictrex.xyz/models/information-theory-physical-reality
